name: clear
description: Delete messages from this channel. Will not delete messages older than two (2) weeks.

name: ban
description: bans a user when they are not in the server.

name: kick
description: Kick mentioned user from this server.

name: lockdown
description: [Prevent/Allow] users from sending messages in the current channel. Permission Overwrites will be lost.

name: mute
description: Prevents a user from sending a message in this server

name: nuke
description: Removes all messages in the channel (Deletes the old channel and makes a copy of it with permissions intact)

name: resetchannel
description: Removes all permission overwrites and resets @everyone permissions to `unset`

name: resetroles
description: Removes **all** custom roles from a user. (@everyone will be excluded)

name: respond
description: Respond to user suggestion

name: softban
description: Kicks a user and deletes all their messages in the past 7 days

name: softlockdown
description: [Prevent/Allow] users without special permissions from sending messages in the current channel. Permission Overwrites will be kept.

description: Toggle to prevent a user from sending a message in this channel

description: Unbans a user from this server

description: Unmutes a muted user from this server.
